br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.data

Class DataManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.data.DataManager

  • public class DataManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The main class for dealing with I/O operations, including i18n. It uses JSON as its data notation.

      DataManager() 
      DataManager(java.lang.String language)
      The constructor instantiates the FileHandle objects and retrieves all informations from the files, so that most of the processing can happen here.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DataManager

        public DataManager()

      • DataManager

        public DataManager(java.lang.String language)
            throws com.badlogic.gdx.utils.SerializationException
        The constructor instantiates the FileHandle objects and retrieves all informations from the files, so that most of the processing can happen here. There should be only one instance of DataManager for the entire application.
        Parameters:
        language - The language to write/recover the files from. The currently supported languages are en_us and pt_br.
        Throws:
        com.badlogic.gdx.utils.SerializationException

    • Method Detail

      • changeLanguage

        public void changeLanguage(java.lang.String language)

      • createFighters

        private void createFighters()
        Populates the Array of fighters in the game with data from file, attributing to each fighter its respective battleAction. This method should be invoked only once in the entire application.

      • createEffects

        private void createEffects()
        Populates the Array of effects in the game with data from file, attributing to each effect its respective battleAction. This method should be invoked only once in the entire application.

      • createTraps

        private void createTraps()
        Populates the Array of traps in the game with data from file, attributing to each trap its respective battleAction. This method should be invoked only once in the entire application.

      • createSettings

        private void createSettings()
                     throws com.badlogic.gdx.utils.SerializationException
        Gets the settings for the game from a file and storages them in the variable settings.
        Throws:
        com.badlogic.gdx.utils.SerializationException - An error while reading or writing an object.

      • retrieveProfiles

        public com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Array<Profile> retrieveProfiles()
                                                       throws com.badlogic.gdx.utils.SerializationException
        Gets the profiles from a file. If the file doesn't exist, it will create one. Since profiles is the only dynamic data, that is, it is possible to modify and create profiles throughout the game, this method may be called multiple times.
        Throws:
        com.badlogic.gdx.utils.SerializationException - An error while reading or writing an object.

      • writeProfile

        public void writeProfile(Profile newProfile)
                  throws com.badlogic.gdx.utils.SerializationException
        Saves a profile to a file ("data/data_profiles.json").
        Parameters:
        profile - The profile to be saved.
        Throws:
        com.badlogic.gdx.utils.SerializationException - An error while reading or writing an object.

      • retrieveFighters

        private com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Array<Fighter> retrieveFighters()
                                                        throws com.badlogic.gdx.utils.SerializationException
        Gets all fighters from a file. This should only be invoked once, and by the object itself; other objects should use the getFighterList() method instead.
        Returns:
        An Array object.
        Throws:
        com.badlogic.gdx.utils.SerializationException - An error while reading or writing an object.
        See Also:
        getFighterList().

      • retrieveEffects

        Returns:
        An Array object.
        Throws:
